MilesWeb.com offers with managed and self-managed VPS packages. The managed VPS hosting packages have the most impressive configurations along with free round the clock support. If you are comfortable with managing your hosting platform by yourself, then you can opt for any of the self-managed VPS hosting packages. All the VPS packages are designed for providing the maximum efficiency and uptime.

Get a discount of 30% on all the managed VPS hosting packages. Use the coupon code ‘BYEBYE2014’.
Click to expand...

All the managed and un-managed VPS hosting packages are available in the following locations:
  • UK
  • USA
  • India
  • Romania
